about_the_game:
Are you after a new VR experience?

Something that tests your skills without leaving you sweating in fear?

Then try Hand Eye Cubination, the first third person VR platformer on Steam!

You heard that right, third person! Platformer!

But how you ask? Why? What even?

Simply put, you control two cubes through the direction your hands are pointing.

Your goal is to guide your cubes through a maze of challenges!

Did I mention you can't see your hands? Because that's a pretty important feature.

You have to rely 100% on your human senses to successfully navigate through the world!

Come give it a crack and put your hand eye coordination to the test!

Hand Eye Cubination!

name: Hand Eye Cubination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Are you after a new VR experience?Come try Hand Eye Cubination!Your job is to guide two cubes through a series of challenging levels with nothing more than your perception of where your flailing limbs are pointing!With no visual clues to assist, you will rely 100% on your human senses to get you through!Check out the store for more info!
